column4: hey guys, where can i find new themes ? and where do i make setting to how things should look - can't find it anywhere....

i've been looking there - but i have no clue what to download - they have gtk, compiz, metacity and what have we not .. don't know what they do or which one i should go for when i want a different theme
metacity unless you have changed stuff, and you probably haven't or you would know which one
